ExternalLearningPtcpResult.name: ExternalLearningPtcpResult
ExternalLearningPtcpResult.description: Represents the outcome of a student's participation in an external learning.

ContactId.description: The contact of the student related to the External Learning Participant Result.

CourseCreditTransferApplnId.description: The Course Credit Transfer Application related to the External Learning Participant Result.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

DurationUnit.description: Specifies the duration unit of the External Learning Participant Result.

EvaluatorContactId.description: The contact of the evaluator related to the External Learning Participant Result.

ExternalLearningId.description: The External Learning related to the External Learning Participant Result.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LetterGrade.description: The letter grade achieved by the student in the external learning.

Name.description: The name of the External Learning Participant Result.

NumericGrade.description: The numeric grade achieved by the student in the external learning.

OwnerId.description: The identifier for the owner of the record.

UnitsEarned.description: The units earned by the student in the external learning.
